subtitle: prosiding rangkaian lokakarya terbatas masalah-masalah kepailitan dan wawasan hukum bisnis lainnya tahun 2004 : 17-18 Februari 2004
contributions: National Conference of Commissioners on Uniform State Laws.
title: Mediasi dan court annexed mediation
by_statement: [kerja sama antara Mahkamah Agung RI dan Pusat Pengkajian Hukum] ; tim editor, ketua, Emmy Yuhassarie ... [et al.].
other_titles: Prosiding rangkaian lokakarya terbatas masalah-masalah kepailitan dan wawasan hukum bisnis lainnya tahun 2004

description.value: On mediation as alternative for business dispute resolution according to Indonesian and international law and regulations.

notes.value:
Includes the texts of: Undang-Undang Tentang Arbitrase dan Alternatif Penyelesaian Sengketa and Uniform Mediation Act.

Includes bibliographical references.

In Indonesian, and some papers in English.
